name: Babel Eclipse
description:
*** CONTROLS ***

WASD / ZQSD : Movement

MOUSE : Aim with first upgrade

LEFT CLICK : Use second upgrade on certain elements

********

Estimated play time : 10 - 20 mins

This is a demo made by a team of 4 for Metroidvania-month-18 game jam (https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-18)

This is a demo version, so expect some bugs.

Game & Level design - Theanael - quartzgolem

Dev - quartzgolem - Exidrew

Musics - quartzgolem

Graphics - Aralorn

Left click icon created by Freepik - Flaticon

Sound effects - 

     - https://chrislsound.itch.io/sci-fi-sfx-pack

     - https://shapeforms.itch.io/cassette

     - https://chrislsound.itch.io/ambient-puzzle

Easter egg : can you find the chicken ? You need the last upgrade to reach it. See the last screen for a hint.

Known bugs : 

- in some rare cases, the turrets never stop firing at you, which forces a full reload of the page.
